alert.note: Alert for Humphreys; Issaquena; Sharkey; Sunflower; Washington; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 2:59PM CDT until March 30 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Sunflower County in northwestern Mississippi... Central Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... North central Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Humphreys County in central Mississippi... Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 259 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms capable of producing a tornado were located along a line extending from near Wayside to near Grace to 7 miles northwest of Eagle Bend, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * These dangerous storms will be near... Rolling Fork, Avon, Grace and Wayside around 305 PM CDT. Anguilla and Nitta Yuma around 310 PM CDT. Delta City, Panther Burn and Tribbett around 315 PM CDT. Hollandale around 320 PM CDT. Murphy, Holly Bluff and Darlove around 325 PM CDT. Indianola around 330 PM CDT. Isola around 335 PM CDT. Belzoni and Inverness around 340 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these tornadic storms include Eden, Silver City, Arcola, Cary and Louise. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

area.areaDesc: Humphreys; Issaquena; Sharkey; Sunflower; Washington; Yazoo
